entries.journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith has asked you to help an associate of his, Kara Corlon.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Johnson Smith has asked you to speak with Kara Corlon and see if you can aid her.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Make all of the deliveries with which Kara needs your help.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Return to Johnson Smith and let him know you've finished helping Kara.
